entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
